articles.author: Tim Grierson, Jon Blistein
articles.title: Catherine O’Hara, a Comedy Great From ‘SCTV’ to ‘Schitt’s Creek,’ Dead at 71 - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Catherine O'Hara, the comic actress celebrated for her work in 'SCTV,' 'Schitt's Creek,' and the films of Christopher Guest, has died.
articles.content:
Catherine O’Hara, the comic actress best known for her work on SCTV, films like Home Alone and Best In Show, and the hit sitcom Schitt’s Creek, died on today at her Los Angeles home. She was 71.
